Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: carcinogenic \car`cin*o*gen"ic\ (k[aum]r`s[i^]n*[-o]*j[e^]n"[i^]k), adj. Causing or tending to cause cancer; as, the carcinogenic action of certain chemicals or of ionizing radiation. -- {car`cin*o*gen*ic"i*ty}, n. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
carcinogenic adj : causing or tending to cause cancer; "the carcinogenic action of certain chemicals"
